Item¶

An item is a real-world item (a book, a CD, ...). An item is typically owned by one person or one group (e.g.: an Owner).

Item Properties¶

id
An internal unique ID
label
a human-readable text to identify the item
photo
a picture of the item

Item Relations¶

owner
The entity which owns this item

Table Of Contents

  • Item
    • Item Properties
    • Item Relations
